intro: I am a 21-year-old computer science student studying at TUNI, majoring in software engineering and minoring in machine learning. Currently I am most interested in the future of web, machine learning and artificial intelligence. In fact, I am planning to major in Machine Learning, Data Science and Artificial Intelligence in my master's studies.

I have almost two years of professional experience as a software developer at Intopalo Digital where I have contributed to various customer projects. I have had the chance to grow, learn new technologies and other relevant skills, solve real problems and have an impact on our customer's businesses.
